name: Snuff
desc:
Bury all your <input type="text" value="" data-result="secrets" /> in my skin
Come away with innocence, and leave me with my <input type="text" value="" data-result="sins" />
The air around me still feels like a <input type="text" value="" data-result="cage" />
And love is just a camouflage for what resembles <input type="text" value="" data-result="rage" /> again

So if you love me <input type="text" value="" data-result="let" /> me go, 
and run <input type="text" value="" data-result="away" /> before I know 
My heart is just too <input type="text" value="" data-result="dark" /> to care
I can't <input type="text" value="" data-result="destroy" /> what isn't there
Deliver me into my <input type="text" value="" data-result="fate" />
If I'm alone I cannot <input type="text" value="" data-result="hate" />
I don't <input type="text" value="" data-result="deserve" /> to have you 
Ooh, my <input type="text" value="" data-result="smile" /> was taken long ago
If I can change I <input type="text" value="" data-result="hope" /> I never know

I still press your <input type="text" value="" data-result="letters" /> to my lips,
And cherish them in parts of me that savor every <input type="text" value="" data-result="kiss" />
I couldn't face a life <input type="text" value="" data-result="without" /> your light 
But all of that was ripped apart
When you <input type="text" value="" data-result="refused" /> to fight

So save your <input type="text" value="" data-result="breath" /> I will not care
I think I made it very clear
You couldn't hate <input type="text" value="" data-result="enough" /> to love
Is that supposed to be enough?
I only wish you weren't my <input type="text" value="" data-result="friend" />,
Then I could <input type="text" value="" data-result="hurt" /> you in the end
I never claimed to be a <input type="text" value="" data-result="saint" />
Ooh, my own was banished long ago
It took the death of <input type="text" value="" data-result="hope" /> to let you go

So break yourself against my <input type="text" value="" data-result="stones" />
And spit your pity in my <input type="text" value="" data-result="soul" />
You never needed any help
You sold me out to <input type="text" value="" data-result="save" /> yourself
And I won't listen to your <input type="text" value="" data-result="shame" />
You ran away you're all the <input type="text" value="" data-result="same" />
Angels lie to keep control
Ooh, my love was <input type="text" value="" data-result="punished" /> long ago 
If you still <input type="text" value="" data-result="care" /> don't ever let me know
If you still dont <input type="text" value="" data-result="care" /> don't ever let me know
